          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vodoravni met</string>
            <string language="en">Horizontal throw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Horizontaler Throw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jet horizontal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Throw horizontal</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Opis vodoravnega meta kot sestavljenega gibanja iz konstantnega premega gibanja in prostega pada.</string>
            <string language="en">Description of horizontal throw as superposition of two motions - uniform horizontal motion and free-fall.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vodoravni met</string>
            <string language="en">horizontal throw</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">vodoravno gibanje</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung des horizontalen Throw als 
Superposition von zwei Bewegungen - konstante horizontale Bewegung und
freier Fall.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description de jet horizontal comme superposition
de deux mouvements - mouvement horizontal et chute libre uniformes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição do throw horizontal como um 
superposition de dois movimentos - movimento horizontal e free-fall 
uniformes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione del tiro orizzontale come 
superposition di due movimenti - movimento orizzontale e caduta libera
dell'uniforme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιγραφή οριζόντιου ρίχνει ως superposition δύο 
κινήσεων - ομοιόμορφα οριζόντια κίνηση και free-fall.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción del tiro horizontal como 
superposición de dos movimientos - movimiento horizontal uniforme y
caída libre.</string>
          </description>
